metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

extracted_sections.section_title: Mediterranean Tuna Salad Ingredients: 1 can tuna, drained

subsection_analysis.refined_text: Gomae (Spinach with Sesame Dressing)    Ingredients:  o 1 bunch spinach  o 2 tablespoons sesame seeds  o 1 tablespoon soy sauce  o 1 tablespoon sugar  o 1 tablespoon mirin    Instructions:  o Blanch spinach in boiling water, then rinse in cold water and squeeze out excess  moisture.  o Toast sesame seeds and grind them.  o Mix sesame seeds with soy sauce, sugar, and mirin.  o Toss spinach with dressing and serve. Mediterranean Tuna Salad Ingredients: 1 can tuna, drained

Kartoffelsalat (Potato Salad)    Ingredients:  o 4 potatoes  o 1 small onion  o 1/4 cup bacon  o 1/4 cup vinegar  o 1/4 cup chicken broth  o 1 tablespoon mustard  o 1 teaspoon sugar  o 1 teaspoon salt  o 1/2 teaspoon pepper
